description: Welcome to VERSANT. A boutique collection of Modern Craftsman-inspired townhomes built by award-winning Infinity Properties. This MOVE IN READY 4-bed 3.5 bath+REC ROOM home features a spacious layout with main level entry. Premium finishes include custom cabinetry, quartz counter, SS app w/GAS cooktop+wall oven & entertaining island. Covered balcony off kitchen w/Gas BBQ outlet. Upper floor feat 3 bed incl SPACIOUS Primary w/spa inspired ensuite and dedicated laundry room. Lower level offers 4th bed, full bath and rec room with access to fully fenced yard. High eff gas furnace w/Heatpump and Rinnai water heater. Enjoy easy access to hiking trails, mtn biking routes+lakes. Only 10 minutes from the Skytrain, West Coast Express+Coquitlam City Centre Shopping+Amenities. Open Sat-Wed 12-5 PM.
